item.title: Peeking with tmux
item.description: tmux uses can use the following snippet to peek at files. Place it in your .bashrc or similar file. peek() { tmux split-window -p 33 "$EDITOR" "$@" } Calling peek <file> will open <file> in lower third of tmux window.
